overview: The boys get jobs as a butler and maid-- Stan in drag-- for a dinner party. When that ends in disaster, they resort to sweeping streets and accidentally capture a bank robber. The grateful bank president sends them to Oxford, at their request, and higher-education hijinks ensue.
tagline: Figuring out a grand time for you!
cast: Stan Laurel|Oliver Hardy|Forrester Harvey|Wilfred Lucas|Forbes Murray
